arabicText: ۞ وَٱلْمُحْصَنَـٰتُ مِنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ إِلَّا مَا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُكُمْ ۖ كِتَـٰبَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ وَأُحِلَّ لَكُم مَّا وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكُمْ أَن تَبْتَغُوا۟ بِأَمْوَٰلِكُم مُّحْصِنِينَ غَيْرَ مُسَـٰفِحِينَ ۚ فَمَا ٱسْتَمْتَعْتُم بِهِۦ مِنْهُنَّ فَـَٔاتُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ فَرِيضَةًۭ ۚ وَلَا جُنَاحَ عَلَيْكُمْ فِيمَا تَرَٰضَيْتُم بِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعْدِ ٱلْفَرِيضَةِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	all	married	women	are	forbidden	for	
you	except	 the	wives	of	disbelievers	who	
come	 into	 your	 possession	 as	
bondwomen;	 this	 is	 Allah’s	 decree	 for	
you;	and	other	 than	 these,	all	women	are	
lawful	 for	 you	 so	 that	 you	 seek	 them	 in	
exchange	 of	 your	 wealth	 in	 proper	
wedlock,	 not	 adultery;	 therefore	 give	 the	
women	 you	 wish	 to	 marry,	 their	
appointed	 bridal	 money;	 and	 after	 the	
appointment	(of	bridal	money)	there	is	no	
sin	 on	 you	 if	 you	 come	 to	 a	 mutual	
agreement;	 indeed	 Allah is	 All	 Knowing,	
Wise
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 harām	 haiñ	 shauhar-dār	 aurteiñ	
magar	 kāfiroñ	 ki	 aurteiñ	jo	 tumhāri	milk	
meiñ āajāyeñ	 ye	 Allah	 ka	 nawishta
(Muqarrar	kardah)	hai	tum	par	aur	un	ke	
siwa	 jo	 rahiñ	 woh	 tumheiñ	 halāl	 haiñ	 ke	
apne	māloñ	ke	‘ewaz	talāsh	karo	qaid	lāte	
na	pāni	girāte	to	jin	aurtoñ	ko	nikāh	meiñ	
lāna	 chāho	 unke	 bandhe	 huwe	 maher	
unheiñ	 do	 aur	 qarār-dād	 (Tai	 shuda)	 ke	
b‘ad	agar	tumhāre	āpas	meiñ	 kuchh	 razā	
mandi	 ho	 jāye	 to	 is	 meiñ	 gunāh	 nahi	
beshak	Allah	Ilm-o-Hikmat	wāla	hai

arabicText: وَمَن لَّمْ يَسْتَطِعْ مِنكُمْ طَوْلًا أَن يَنكِحَ ٱلْمُحْصَنَـٰتِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ فَمِن مَّا مَلَكَتْ أَيْمَـٰنُكُم مِّن فَتَيَـٰتِكُمُ ٱلْمُؤْمِنَـٰتِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِإِيمَـٰنِكُم ۚ بَعْضُكُم مِّنۢ بَعْضٍۢ ۚ فَٱنكِحُوهُنَّ بِإِذْنِ أَهْلِهِنَّ وَءَاتُوهُنَّ أُجُورَهُنَّ بِٱلْمَعْرُوفِ مُحْصَنَـٰتٍ غَيْرَ مُسَـٰفِحَـٰتٍۢ وَلَا مُتَّخِذَٰتِ أَخْدَانٍۢ ۚ فَإِذَآ أُحْصِنَّ فَإِنْ أَتَيْنَ بِفَـٰحِشَةٍۢ فَعَلَيْهِنَّ نِصْفُ مَا عَلَى ٱلْمُحْصَنَـٰتِ مِنَ ٱلْعَذَابِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِىَ ٱلْعَنَتَ مِنكُمْ ۚ وَأَن تَصْبِرُوا۟ خَيْرٌۭ لَّكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	whoever	among	you	does	not	have	in	
marriage	 free,	 believing	 women	 due	 to	
poverty,	should	marry	 from	 the	believing	
bondwomen	 you	 own;	 and	 Allah knows	
well	your	faith;	you	are	from	one	another;	
therefore	 marry	 them	 with	 the	
permission	 of	 their	 masters,	 and	 give	
them	 their	 bridal	 money	 according	 to	
custom,	 they	 becoming	 (faithful)	 wives,	
not	 committing	 mischief	 or	 secretly	
making	friends;	so	when	they	are	married	
and	commit	the	shameful,	for	them	is	half	
the	 punishment	 prescribed	 for	 free	 women;	 this	is	 for	 one	 among	 you	 who	 fears	 falling	into	
adultery;	and	to	practice	patience	is	better	for	you;	and	Allah is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 tum	meiñ	be	maqdoori	ke	ba‘is	jinke	
Nikāh	meiñ	āzād	aurteiñ	Imān	wāliyāñ	na	
hoñ	to	unse	Nikāh	kare	jo	tumhāre	hāth	ki	
milk	 haiñ	 Imān	 wāli	 kanizeiñ	 aur	 Allah	
tumhāre	 Imān	 ko	 khoob	 jānta	 hai	 tum	
meiñ	ek	 doosre	 se	 hai	 to	 unse	Nikāh	 karo	 unke	mālikoñ	 ki	ijāzat	 se	aur	 hasb-e-dastoor	 unke	
maher	unheiñ	do	qaid	meiñ	ātiyāñ	na	masti	nikālti	aur	na	yār	banāti	jab	woh	qaid	meiñ	ājāyeiñ	
phir	burā	kām	kareiñ	to	un	par us	sazā	ki	ādhi	hai	jo	āzād	aurtoñ	par	hai	yeh	us	ke	liye	jise	tum	
meiñ	se	zina	ka	andesha	hai	aur	sabr	karna	tumhāre	liye	behtar	hai	aur	Allah	bakhsh	ne	wāla	
maherbān	hai

arabicText: يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيُبَيِّنَ لَكُمْ وَيَهْدِيَكُمْ سُنَنَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكُمْ وَيَتُوبَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Allah wills	to	explain	His	commands	to	you	and	show	you	the	ways	of	those	before	you,	and	to	
incline	towards	you	with	His	mercy;	and	Allah is	All	Knowing,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah	chāhta	hai	ke	apne	ahkām	tumhāre	liye	sāf	bayān	kar	de	aur	tumheiñ	agloñ	ki	rawisheiñ
(taur	tariqe)	batā	de	aur	tum	par	apni	Rahmat	se	rujú farmāye	aur	Allah	Ilm-o-Hikmat	wāla	hai.

arabicText: وَٱللَّهُ يُرِيدُ أَن يَتُوبَ عَلَيْكُمْ وَيُرِيدُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّبِعُونَ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ أَن تَمِيلُوا۟ مَيْلًا عَظِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
And	 Allah wills	 to	 incline	 towards	 you	
with	 His	 mercy;	 and	 those	 who	 pursue	
their	 own	 pleasures	wish	 that	 you	 be	 far	
separated	from	the	Straight	Path.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Allah	 tum	 par	 apni	 Rahmat	 se	 rujú
farmāna	chāhta	hai	aur	jo	apne	mazoñ	ke	
peeche	 pardhe	 haiñ	 woh	 chāhte	 haiñ	 ke	
tum	seedhi	rāh	se	bahut	alag	ho	jāo.

arabicText: يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ أَن يُخَفِّفَ عَنكُمْ ۚ وَخُلِقَ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنُ ضَعِيفًۭا
englishTranslationText:
Allah wills	 to	 lessen	 your	 burden;	 and	
man	was	created	weak.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Allah	 chāhta	 hai	 ki tum	 par	 takhfeef
(āsāni) kare	 aur	 ādmi	 kamzor	 banāya	
gayā

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ لَا تَأْكُلُوٓا۟ أَمْوَٰلَكُم بَيْنَكُم بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ إِلَّآ أَن تَكُونَ تِجَـٰرَةً عَن تَرَاضٍۢ مِّنكُمْ ۚ وَلَا تَقْتُلُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ بِكُمْ رَحِيمًۭا
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 who	 Believe!	 Do	 not	 unjustly	
devour	the	property	of	each	other,	except	
through	 trade	 by	mutual	 agreement;	 and	
do	 not	 kill	 yourselves;	 indeed	 Allah is	
Most	Merciful	upon	you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Imān	 wālo!	 Āpas	 meiñ	 ek	 doosre	 ke	
māl	 na-haq	 na	 khāo	 magar	 yeh	 ke	 koi	
sauda	 tumhāri	 bāhami	 raza	 mandi	 ka	 ho	
aur	apni	jāneiñ	qatl	na	karo	beshak	Allah	
tum	par	maherbān	hai.

arabicText: وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ عُدْوَٰنًۭا وَظُلْمًۭا فَسَوْفَ نُصْلِيهِ نَارًۭا ۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرًا
englishTranslationText:
And	whoever	 does	 that	 through	injustice	
and	oppression,	We	shall	soon	put	him	in	
the	fire;	and	this	is	easy	for	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 jo	 zulm-o-ziyādati	 se	 aisa	 karega	 to	
an-qareeb	 ham	 usey	 āg	 meiñ	 dākhil	
kareñge	aur	yeh	Allah	ko	āsān	hai
